mobile.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 ultra
mobile.Body: 163.4x78.1x8.9mm, 234g; Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), glass back (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), aluminum frame; IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 1.5m for 30 mins).
mobile.Display: 6.80 Dynamic AMOLED 2X, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1750 nits (peak), 1440x3088px resolution, 19.3:9 aspect ratio, 501ppi; Always-on display.
mobile.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8550-AC Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 (4 nm): Octa-core (1x3.36 GHz Cortex-X3 & 2x2.8 GHz Cortex-A715 & 2x2.8 GHz Cortex-A710 & 3x2.0 GHz Cortex-A510); Adreno 740.
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 200 MP, f/1.7, 24mm, 1/1.3, 0.6µm, multi-directional PDAF, Laser AF, OIS; Telephoto: 10 MP, f/2.4, 70mm, 1/3.52, 1.12µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom; Telephoto: 10 MP, f/4.9, 230mm, 1/3.52, 1.12µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS, 10x optical zoom; Ultra wide angle: 12 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚, 1/2.55, 1.4µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, Super Steady video.
mobile.Videocapture: Rear camera: 8K@24/30fps, 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/240fps, 720p@960fps, HDR10+, stereo sound rec., gyro-EIS; Front camera: 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30fps.
mobile.Battery: 5000mAh; 45W wired, PD3.0, 65% in 30 min (advertised), Wireless (Qi/PMA), 4.5W reverse wireless.
mobile.Misc: Fingerprint reader (under display, ultrasonic); Stylus (Bluetooth integration, accelerometer, gyro); NFC; stereo speakers; Samsung DeX, Samsung Wireless DeX, Bixby natural language commands and dictation, Samsung Pay (Visa, MasterCard certified), Ultra Wideband (UWB) support.

mobile.title: Iphone 13 pro max
mobile.Body: 160.8x78.1x7.7mm, 240g; Glass front (Gorilla Glass), glass back (Gorilla Glass), stainless steel frame; IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 6m for 30 mins), Apple Pay (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX certified).
mobile.Display: 6.70 Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 1200 nits (peak), 1284x2778px resolution, 19.47:9 aspect ratio, 458ppi; Wide color gamut, True-tone.
mobile.Chipset: Apple A15 Bionic (5 nm): Hexa-core (2x3.22 GHz Avalanche + 4xX.X GHz Blizzard); Apple GPU (5-core graphics).
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 12 MP, f/1.5, 26mm, 1.9µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS; Telephoto: 12 MP, f/2.8, 77mm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optcal zoom; Ultra wide angle: 12 MP, f/1.8, 13mm, 120˚, PDAF; Depth: TOF 3D LiDAR scanner
mobile.Videocapture: Rear camera: 4K@24/30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240fps, 10‑bit HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), ProRes, Cinematic mode, stereo sound rec; Front camera: 4K@24/25/30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/120fps, gyro-EIS.
mobile.Battery: 4352mAh; Fast charging 27W, 50% in 30 min (advertised), USB Power Delivery 2.0, MagSafe wireless charging 15W, Qi magnetic fast wireless charging 7.5W.
mobile.Misc: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer; NFC; Siri natural language commands and dictation, Ultra Wideband (UWB) support.

mobile.title: Motorola edge 30
mobile.Body: 163.1x76.0x8.8mm, 196g; Glass front (Gorilla Glass 3), glass back (Gorilla Glass 5), plastic frame; Water-repellent design.
mobile.Display: 6.70 OLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, HDR10+, 1080x2400px resolution, 20:9 aspect ratio, 393ppi; Always-on display.
mobile.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm): Octa-core (1x3.00 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.50 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A510); Adreno 730.
mobile.Memory: 128GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 12GB RAM, 512GB 8GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM; UFS 3.1.
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 50 MP, f/1.8, 1/1.55, 1.0µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS; Ultra wide angle: 50 MP, f/2.2, 114˚, 1/2.76, 0.64µm, AF; Depth: 2 MP, f/2.4.
mobile.Videocapture: Rear camera: 8K@30fps, 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240/960fps, 10-bit HDR10+, gyro-EIS; Front camera: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/120fps.
mobile.Battery: 4800mAh; Fast charging 68W, 100% in 35 min (advertised), Fast wireless charging 15W, Reverse wireless charging 5W.
mobile.Misc: Fingerprint reader (side-mounted); NFC; Ready For support.

mobile.title: Xiaomi 12 pro
mobile.Display: 6.73 LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 1000 nits (HBM), 1500 nits (peak), 1440x3200px resolution, 20:9 aspect ratio, 521ppi.
mobile.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm): Octa-core (1x3.00 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.50 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A510); Adreno 730.
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 50 MP, f/1.9, 24mm, 1/1.28, 1.22µm, Dual Pixel PDAF, OIS; Ultra wide angle: 50 MP, f/2.2, 115˚; Telephoto: 50 MP, f/1.9, 48mm, PDAF, 2x optical zoom.
mobile.Battery: 4600mAh; Fast charging 120W, 100% in 18 min (advertised), Fast wireless charging 50W, 100% in 42 min (advertised), Reverse wireless charging 10W, Power Delivery 3.0, Quick Charge 4+.
mobile.Misc: Fingerprint reader (under display, optical); NFC; Infrared port, Virtual proximity sensing.

mobile.title: Huawei Mate 50 Pro
mobile.Body: 162.1x75.5x8.5mm, 205g; glass front, aluminum frame, glass or leather back; IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 6m for 30 mins).
mobile.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8475 Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 4G (4 nm): Octa-core (1x3.19 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.75 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x2.0 GHz Cortex-A510); Adreno 730.
mobile.Memory: 256GB 8GB RAM, 512GB 8GB RAM; UFS 3.1; NM (Nano Memory), up to 256GB (uses shared SIM slot).
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 50 MP, f/1.4-f/4.0, 27mm, PDAF, Laser AF, OIS; Telephoto: 64 MP, f/3.5, 95mm, PDAF, OIS, 3.5x optical zoom; Ultra wide angle: 13 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚, PDAF.
mobile.Videocapture: Rear camera: 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/120/240/480fps, 720p@960fps, 720p@3840fps, HDR, gyro-EIS; Front camera: 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/240fps.
mobile.Battery: 4700mAh; Fast charging 66W, Fast wireless charging 50W, Reverse wireless charging 5W.
mobile.Misc: fingerprint reader (under display, optical); NFC; Infrared port; stereo speakers.

mobile.title: One plus 10 pro
mobile.Body: 163x73.9x8.55mm, 201g; Gorilla Glass 5 back, aluminum frame, ceramic camera cover.
mobile.Display: 6.7 Fluid AMOLED with LPTO, 1 billion colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, 1440x3216px resolution, 20.1:9 aspect ratio, 525ppi.
mobile.Chipset: Qualcomm SM8450 Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 (4 nm): Octa-core (1x3.00 GHz Cortex-X2 & 3x2.50 GHz Cortex-A710 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A510); Adreno 730.
mobile.Rearcamera: Wide (main): 50 MP Sony IMX 789, f/1.8, 23mm, 1/1.43, 1.22µm, Muilti-Autofocus: All-Pixel Omni-directional PDAF + LAF + CAF, OIS; Ultra wide angle: 50 MP Samsung ISOCELL JN1, 1/2.76, f/2.2, 150˚; Telephoto: 8 MP, 1.0µm f/2.4, PDAF, 3.3X optical zoom. OIS.
mobile.Battery: 5,000mAh; 65W SuperVOOC (80W in Asia), 100% in 34 min (advertised), 50W AirVOOC, 100% in 47 min (advertised), Reverse wireless charging.
mobile.Misc: Fingerprint reader (under display, optical); NFC; flick-detect sensor, front RGB sensor. SLA X-axis linear motor.

televesion.title: Sony X85K 85 Class 4K HDR LED TV
televesion.Display: LED TV Screen.4K Ultra HD display resolution. HDR10 - makes whites brighter, intensifies colour and enhances the overall picture for an epic cinematic effect. Motion rate 100Hz.Viewing angle 89/89 degrees.Resolution 3840 x 2160 pixels.
televesion.Sound: Dolby Atmos sound system.10 x 10 watt RMS power output.
televesion.Connectivity: 2 USB ports and 4 HDMI sockets.Headphone socket.Optical connection.Built in Wi-Fi.Ethernet connection.Bluetooth.
televesion.Features: Voice control - works with Amazon Alexa, built in Google assistant, works with Siri.Google TV operating system.Compatible with the following smart apps: Now TV, disney+, Netflix, BBC iPlayer, ITV Hub, My5, All 4, Amazon Prime, YouTube.Internet browser. Miracast.Features USB recording and video playback. Freeview HD and Freesat HD digital tuner.Freeview HD (UK) and Saorview (ROI).Saorview digital tuner (Saorview can only be received in the Republic of Ireland).X1 4K HDR processor processor. Sleep timer.Parental controls.Aerial required.Manufacturer's 1 year guarantee.EAN: 4548736137493.

televesion.Box: TV.Voice remote control (requires 2 x AAAbatteries, included).Power cable.TV stand.Screws. Also in the box: Batteries, AC Power Cord, Operating Instructions, Quick Setup Guide, Table Top Stand.
